text: John Charles Cooksey (August 20, 1941 â€“ June 4, 2022) was an American ophthalmologist and politician. He was a Republican member of the United States House of Representatives for Louisiana's 5th congressional district from 1997 to 2003. Cooksey died on June 4, 2022, at the age of 80. ==References== ==Other websites== * * Vote 2002 profile , PBS * Congress freshmen 1997 profile, CNN * Category:1941 births Category:2022 deaths Category:United States representatives from Louisiana Category:Scientists from Louisiana Category:Republican Party (United States) politicians Category:Members of the Louisiana State Legislature
